description:
This subject begins with an overview of major changes in the global environment today and how these changes impact
organizations and people, followed by a reassessment of the effectiveness of organizational and business models with
an aim to establish alternatives that are effective in today’s environment. An examination of people relations and learning not only demonstrates the human side of the business management, but also casts light on the complexity and the reality that exists across organizations. The subject concludes by focusing on work and career, discussing their meaning and the implications on individuals. Major topics include Rethinking the World; Rethinking Business and Organizations; Rethinking Learning; Rethinking People and Reframing Work & Career.
title: Business, Management And People
